page.title: 06Leisure Questionnaire Data.
page.content: The following points emerged from a 'leisure' questionnaire distributed in Mattishall on July 10th.,1985. First,a list of clubs and societies currently active in the village: Badminton,Cubs,Scouts,Brownies,Guides, Football,Women's Institute,Keep-Fit, Cricket,Ballet,Young Wives,Over 60 Club,Playgroup,Mattishall Society, Young Saints,Sunshine Corner,Mothers' Union,Parent/Teacher Associations,Baby Sitting,British Legion,Bowls. Of these,the Mattishall Society, concerned with any matters of local interest,was the most popular. Some of those questioned expressed the desire to see more clubs:Music,Art and Craft,Spinning and Weaving,Table Tennis,Snooker,Gardening,Youth Club, Ornithology and more evening classes at the Middle School.
